title: Something went wrong
body:
everytime when i try to make PBE account i got- Sometning went wrong try in a few seconds and i have this problem 2 years help plz
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
This error typically pops up if there's something wrong in your network routing to this page. Can you try [**clearing your browser data**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752694-Clearing-Browser-History-and-Cookies) and using a VPN such as [**Hotspot Shield**](https://www.hotspotshield.com/) or [**Cyberghost**](http://www.cyberghostvpn.com/en_us) to see if the issue persists?

Let me know if this worked for you.
